module.name: External Tools
module.description: This is a module to support externally hosted tools using the IMS Basic LTI specification to launch those tools.

release.notes: This module is an implementation of the IMS Basic LTI that extends the ATutor content editor. Feedback, bug reports, etc. should be posted to the atutor.ca developer or modules forums. Be sure to review the README file included with the module (linked above) for more about setting up BasicLTI remote tools in ATutor.
